title: [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading
body:
The Ploygon node synced here is showing a lot of logs and it has been up to 9 hours at this stage, is this normal?
```
[INFO] [01-26|05:37:28.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=43a81523
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:37:58.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=46ba1fb8
[INFO] [01-26|05:38:10.518] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=10000 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=6.7GB sys=13.1GB
[INFO] [01-26|05:38:28.387] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=49aa6c1f
[INFO] [01-26|05:38:33.288] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=466 eth67=30
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:38:58.388] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=4c85689a
[INFO] [01-26|05:39:10.569] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=10000 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=4.6GB sys=13.1GB
[INFO] [01-26|05:39:28.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=4fa0f054
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:39:58.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=5259f881
[INFO] [01-26|05:40:10.520] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=10000 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=6.6GB sys=13.1GB
[INFO] [01-26|05:40:33.287] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=466 eth67=31
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:40:50.486] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=5570c03f
[INFO] [01-26|05:40:58.387] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=564180a0
[INFO] [01-26|05:41:12.222] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=9999 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=4.5GB sys=13.1GB
[INFO] [01-26|05:41:28.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=595e37a6
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:41:58.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=5c70a60b
[INFO] [01-26|05:42:10.514] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=10000 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=6.4GB sys=13.1GB
[INFO] [01-26|05:42:28.386] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=5fcb3346
[INFO] [01-26|05:42:33.287] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=466 eth67=31
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:42:58.388] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=63234a1c
[INFO] [01-26|05:43:10.580] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=10000 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=4.4GB sys=13.1GB
[INFO] [01-26|05:43:28.387] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=6659b5db
^A[INFO] [01-26|05:43:58.387] [8/16 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedCodeHash current_prefix=69cd5203
[INFO] [01-26|05:44:10.513] [txpool] stat                            block=37345429 pending=10000 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=6.3GB sys=13.1GB
```
likely you have high-latency disk - like gp3, then it's normal. also we added some parallelization of this stage in recent release.
Latest feedback, we are using the essd disk type from AliCloud and so far erigon polygon is running well.Latency has been reduced from 30,000 microseconds, to 100 microseconds
